评论详情: Ordered and was sent the wrong size the first time I requested it be corrected was told i would get it within a couple days, then it was over a week later it came in.  The feel is okay, the get a bigger size than what you wear

评论概述: Perfect for dress up at work!
评论详情: I needed an inexpensive “Decades Day” outfit and this windbreaker combo worked out perfectly. The sizing was true to size (even though some reviews said it runs small), and it is stylish for the occasion.  The material on the thinner side so be prepared to layer if you plan to wear it outside.

I can't believe the cuteness and quality of this windsuit! It is incredibly soft and the material is strong. The colors are brilliant. I look exactly like my mother in the 80s which is what I was going for! I will not only wear this as a costume, but everyday wear.
I sized up based on previous reviews but this definitely runs big! I’m 5’3 145 lbs
Super cute, comfortable and a nice material that breathes.
Very cute for the price. Not super sturdy by any means, but will work for what I need. Unfortunately, the pants run long and I'm short. Other than that, it's exactly what you pay for.
The material is nice, I will use it for a costume in an 80s play.  The crotch is not finished or has come unstitched.  I was able to sew it back.
Too large.
As advertised, fit great and comfortable, wore it to my 80’s night on my cruise.
This outfit was perfect for our 80's themed party. clothes were comfortable and it was pretty close to true to size. I might go up one size to be a little more comfy.
It’s not actual windbreaker material but it is comfy. I am 5’4”, 145lbs. I normally wear a medium but sized up to a large on recommendation. Large fit perfect! I wore it for Decade Day at work!
2x fit like a xlarge so you need to buy a bigger size
This is a fun ensemble and the material is very good quality, so there is no transparency. I was very impressed with the stitching and fit. It was just what I had hoped for.
Super cute for awkward 90’s photos!!!!!
Lightweight and thin but perfect for my mother/som dance.

This worked for what I needed it for, just one day to dress up in 80’s style. But I have to say the quality is pretty cheap, the sewing was crooked, lots of loose strings. The material was a little more stiff. But it worked for the dress up day we had at work.
needs to be lightly lined for comfort. other than that it's great.
I love this tracksuit, but it fit a little to snug for me so I had to return it.
Nice and lightweight but not see through.
Wore this outfit for a 90s theme barbie outfit,  fot true to size, good material and so many compliments!
The track suit was bought as a costume.  However, the material felt very cheap and the track suit was tighter than expected.  I had ordered a size up.  The color and design was as expected.
True to labeled size, unforgiving material. It’s not lined like my original, but I’m looking forward to using it.
I love this. Took me back to the 80’s lol! But it did run small
Don’t size up or down. Be realistic on your sizing and be aware that this is NOT stretchy. The fabric is thin. It served the purpose I needed - fun sibling photos.
I wore this to an 80’s themed birthday/ Halloween party- It was perfect! It is so cute and comfy! I would totally recommend this to anyone!
I needed it last minute for a party and it was perfect. True to size and very stretchy.

Used these for a throwback photo shoot. They aren’t thick and won’t break the wind but they were better than costume quality. Anyways they were fun and worked for our needs. Cost was good for the value.

I bought this for myself because it reminded me of a windsuit my mom had when I was a kid. I thought it would be funny but also nice for when I want to go to the beach in the winter (I live in Myrtle Beach). The colors are vibrant. I'm in a large, comfortably, though I'm an extra large most of the time. The tag is in Chinese so I don't know what material it is exactly, but it's not stretchy and holds in an appropriate amount of warmth over other clothes. I am definitely gonna rip a hole in the crotch or butt of these if I am not careful. In the photos above, I'm wearing it over leggings and a sweater. You pretty much have to wear it over something because it is not lined. I shared a picture of the inside and that kind of seam work is always itchy to me. With all of that being said, I love the color, fit, and feel. It just isn't a classic 90's windsuit like I thought.
It felt like cheap medical scrub material. I ordered up a size and the pants were still way too tight.

Ordered this to wear with my sister for some goofy pictures for a gift. Open it up to wear thinking it should be great because it says no returns if worn. There is puke all over the jacket. I had no choice but to wear it. We scrubbed out as much as we could so it wouldn’t be seen but it is disgusting, stained and there is a bleach stain on it. Disappointed that this is the product  I received.
Great colors and fit! Very light as expected, great price!
This looked exactly like the picture. It runs a little small so if you want the waist of the pants and waist of the jacket loose you might want to size up!
Quality was good. Fit was accurate. Comfortable for my 80’s Halloween party!would buy again.
Cute outfit, but the quality is disappointing for the price. The material is thin and definitely feels like costume material. Using appropriate materials would not have cost much more.

This material is very thin and can rip easily. The pocket wasn’t sewn together on the jacket. If you buy this item for a party, take extra pants with you. My coworker bought the same one and her pant leg seam came apart. Order a size up
Perfect if need 80s theme dressing. Pants run a bit tight in waist and legs.
Ordered it for Homecoming week dress up in the 80’ day!  Daughter loves it so much she plans in wearing it through the winter!

评论概述: This outfit blended right in with other 80's costumes.
评论详情: It fit well and was made of quality material. My daughter had me order this so she would fit in on her 80s float at homecoming. It worked great.
Wonderful, 80s inspired wind suit. Runs a little small.
Good quality for price but the pants are not it. They are true to size for the waist band. Although if you have curves the pants won’t fit or will be too snug to move because of the thighs / bottom.
Looks just like the picture! I did size up and I am glad I did. I am normally a small and I got a medium. For reference my measurements are: bust 31in, waist 26in, hips 37in.
Fit just right
Was a little big but it's still perfect.
Elastic was super tight. No return option 👎🏼
I love the material is thin and lightweight. Pants were tight in thigh area. I'm afraid they will rip seams. Over all i love the fit. Just would up size next time
No room for movement, it’s pretty tight even if you size up which is what I did. The top of fitted and cute though.
Ordered this item to wear to an 80's party. Item runs small
Wore this for an 80s themed event and it rocked!
Design is not bad, too. Also, if there is an opportunity, I will consider purchasing again.
I wish I would have gotten my regular size instead of listening to reviews saying it runs small. Baggier than I'd like, but I'll make it work. Material is pretty thin, but doesn't seem too flimsy.
I bought this for a throwback party. It’s so cute and comfortable that I will definitely be wearing it when it gets cool!
This outfit was too small.  Will send back to Amazon.
It was amazing ti wear for my school spirt day. However the legs ripped through out the day.

评论概述: Looks good, but waste ban too tight and no difference for multiple sizes
评论详情: I bought 2 different sizes of this for an themed event and the 2 were identical around the waist, but the larger one had more material. I had to adjust the smaller one to make it work. Looks great otherwise, but waist is way too tight.

I bought this to go to an 80s themed fundraiser. It’s very comfy, not see-through, not too heavy, and high-waisted. The quality was better than I was expecting. This would hold up for multiple costume occasions!
Used it for retro day at school. It was perfect,  quality is great does not look cheap at all. Well worth the price, will be wearing them as separate pieces they are really nice.
Runs small —so should up a size. But it worked for our 80’s themed party.
This outfit was a hit at an 80's birthday party.  The pants fit a bit odd, but hey it was for a party.
Went to a 70s party and it was great.
Great quality
